pullRequest.title: CB-5176 Create new test case(s) for validate S3 FreeIPA, DataLake and DataHub logs are created
pullRequest.bodyText: @lnardai please review and merge if it is OK for you.

nodes.bodyText: The only difference between this and the first test of class is that this test checks freeipa logs, but the first test of the class also creates freeipa (within parent class), i think it would be better if we only add the freeipa log check check into the first test and remove this second one.
